1.0.name: wordpress/goolytics-simple-google-analytics
1.0.description:
I needed to have a clean and small plugin that offers data protection options for users running sites in Germany. Unlike many other Google Analytics plugins it offers to anonymize IPs as it's neccessary for german users in order to have the GA code respect german data protection rules.

Features:

  • Simple and guided setup
  • Lightweight and fast plugin code
  • Anonymize IP (recommended for german users to respect german data protection rules)

Developer on Google+ | Developer on Twitter

Included languages:

  • English
  • German (de_DE) (Thanks to me ;-))

Looking for more WordPress plugins? Visit http://www.schloebe.de/portfolio/
